text:
(upbeat electronic pop music)
- So my name
is Shafiq Amarsi.

I lead the worldwide
sales strategy, operations

and enablement teams for
AWS Commercial Sales.

I've been at AWS for
almost seven years now.

I joined AWS in the Americas
commercial sales business
to lead the sales strategy operations
and enablement functions

with pretty small team back
then, we've grown incredibly,
added a lot of the capabilities.
It's been an amazing ride.
Couple of highlights over the years,

it's really around the building
culture that we have here.
I've got a chance to build things
that I had not even contemplated.

And we have freedom to innovate
on behalf of our customers,
which is truly exceptional.
One of the biggest surprises that I've had

in the time here is the
continued growth in the business.
It's really day one.

And as big as we are, as
fast as we're growing,

the opportunity ahead
of us is still enormous.
For people who are considering AWS,
there're two things
that I think are really important.
First is that we are a team of builders.

We're a global team, and
we're building like crazy.

And so if you want to get
things done and have an impact,
AWS is the place to be.
The second thing I'd call out is,
a lot of places talk about culture.
We really live it here.
Our culture is pretty unique and special,
anchored on our leadership principles,
and in my opinion,

it's how we really impact our
customers most effectively,
is through our team showing up

and living our leadership
principles through our culture.
